entry.title: Segregated Witness features wish list
entry.summary: The email thread from December 10, 2015 on the bitcoin-dev mailing list includes a comment from jl2012 regarding the inclusion of sum criteria in the witness hash tree. The idea is that the block can indicate how many sum criteria there are and additional ones could be soft-forked in. However, jl2012 notes that they have not tried implementing this yet.
